description: Navigate a shifting maze while avoiding invisible ghosts in this strategic platformer.
rationale: This game introduces complex spatial reasoning and memory challenges. It is designed for players who enjoy the puzzle-platformer genre, specifically targeting those who appreciate the 'Ghost House' mechanics of classic 16-bit era platformers. For AI agents, it provides a rigorous test for pathfinding under uncertainty.
details: The game is a 2D grid-based platformer set in a spooky mansion. The player controls a character who must find a hidden key and reach the exit door. Key mechanics include: 1. Shifting Walls: Every 10 seconds, specific walls appear or disappear based on a fixed pattern. 2. Boo-logic Enemies: Ghosts only move toward the player when the player is facing away. When the player faces them, they turn transparent and stop moving. 3. Invisible Platforms: Certain platforms are only visible when the player is within a 3-tile radius. 4. Win Condition: Collect the key and enter the door. 5. Lose Condition: Contact with a ghost or falling into a pit.
how_to_play: Goal: Reach the exit door with the key. Controls: Arrow keys for movement and jumping. Score: +500 for collecting the key, +1000 for exiting the level, -10 per second to encourage speed. Facing direction is critical: press the opposite arrow key to look at ghosts and stop their pursuit.
